title: Corner Cupboard
description: Corner Cupboard; Bernard II van Risenburgh (French, after 1696 - about 1766, master before 1730); Japan; about 1740; Oak and maple veneered with amaranth, cherry, and sycamore maple. set with panels of black Japanese lacquer on Japanese arborvitae and painted with vernis Martin; gilt-bronze mounts; sarrancolin marble top; 99.4 x 88.3 x 61.3 cm (39 1/8 x 34 3/4 x 24 1/8 in.); 72.DA.44.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
